Posts.Content: No, I have not had the test, so I wondered if anybody else had.
Posts.Title: Important Breast Cancer Detection Test

Posts.Content: Information regarding the BT test can be found at www.provista.com
Posts.Title: Important Breast Cancer Detection Test

Posts.Content: Has anyone with a family history of breast cancer had the Biomarker Translation Test done, and is it a good test?
Posts.Title: Biomarker Translation Test (BT)

Posts.Content: Has anybody had the Biomarker Translation (BT) Test?  It is a blood test that can identify breast cancer before it can be seen on a mammogram.  It is offered by Provista.
Posts.Title: Important Breast Cancer Detection Test
